item.title: Writing Simple Webpage With Alpine.js and Tailwind
item.description: Alpine.js is a lightweight Javscript framework that was designed to be a minimal tool for composing behavior directly in your markup. In this post I’ll show you how to create a simple website with Alpine.js.

item.title: Introducing GHAST Stack
item.description: GHAST stack is a new tech-stack for developing web applications without excessive use of Javascript. In this article I describe why I am suggesting usage of this tech-stack and what technologies it uses.
